attributes.action: Index link the pensions of MPs to the trade agreement with the EU.
attributes.background: MPs are voting for a withdrawal agreement which could make it impossible to get a reasonable deal in any trade negotiations with the EU. If they are confident that they can get a good deal they should be rewarded. If they fail then they should be penalized

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:

http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
